Name: Pall Mall Martini
Ingredients: 5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A classic Martini served ' perfect ' with the merest hint of mint.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Pall Mall Martini contains 160 calories
